phases.state: The robot dog is located at the starting point (25.0, 25.0), ready to receive coordinates.
phases.phase_target: Navigate to the center of the 10x10 square identified by the drone as containing the ball.
phases.low_level_plan:
RobotDog.process_messages()
RobotDog.get_position_data('ball_square_center')
RobotDog.move_to(ball_square_center_x, ball_square_center_y)
RobotDog.has_reached(ball_square_center_x, ball_square_center_y)
RobotDog.get_position_data()
RobotDog.send_data_to_apm()

phases.state: The robot dog is located at (dog_location_x, dog_location_y), the center of the 10x10 square.
phases.phase_target: Scan the surrounding area (2 meters in all directions) to locate the ball.

phases.state: The robot dog has located the ball at (ball_location_x, ball_location_y).
phases.phase_target: Navigate to the ball and pick it up.
phases.low_level_plan:
RobotDog.get_position_data('ball')
RobotDog.move_to(ball_location_x, ball_location_y)
RobotDog.has_reached(ball_location_x, ball_location_y)
RobotDog.jump()
RobotDog.send_data_to_apm()

phases.state: The robot dog has successfully picked up the ball.
